content: Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage their bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on their bounty campaign), Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO), or use their platform at your own risk.

comments.author: julerz12

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Foundation wants you to become a key decision-maker in a football club that will be acquired by RADA. RADA is dedicated to discovering and nurturing rising stars in the world of football. Join RADA community to participate in this exciting journey.Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1672484709186633731

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Foundation will be choosing the rising stars for the project to sponsor. If asked, what are the attributes you are looking for a RADA Football player?Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1672967895813435393

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Being part of the IEO of RADA token will bring liquidity to the cryptocurrency to help in the operations of RADA Foundation. To learn more about the project, go to their website at https://therada.ioSource: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1673571971886460930

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Foundation will search for qualified RADAs to be sponsored by the community. If you have given the opportunity, who would you choose to be the best Football Player for RADA?Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1673692779480772608

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Are you a huge fan of Football? Do you like to be part of a DAO that owns a Football Club and gives its community the voice to be heard? Then if yes, join RADA at their community platforms at¬† https://discord.gg/radafoundation and https://t.me/eng_radaSource: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1674417578226364430

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: "The core team behind the RADA Foundation is available for interaction during AMAs (Ask Me Anything sessions) and community events.Get to know the team better by visiting their website https://therada.ioSource: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1675021522686058496

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Foundation has an NFT collection to support RADA players financially and in any aspect needed by the player. Here is a sneak peek of what the NFT may look like.Be part of our community at https://discord.gg/radafoundation to learn more.Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1675142416989290497

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Tokens serve as tokens for the DAO, providing holders with the ability to actively participate in community decision-making. RADA Tokens can be utilized for proposing ideas, voting rights, funding initiatives, and participating in NFT draws.Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1674296747823177729

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Foundation is a DAO with a governance token, RADA, and NFT collections attributed to Football and its RADA players. Visit the RADA website at https://therada.io to learn more about them. Join their community at https://discord.gg/radafoundationSource: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1674055167010824194

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: RADA Tokens are the governance token for the project. Having your RADA Tokens gives you the right to vote within the DAO for major decision-making.Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1673330304184991746

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Even though the decision regarding the Football club for the DAO implementation lies with the centralized authority of the RADA Foundation, RADA values your input. If you had the chance to personally select a club, which one would you choose and why?Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1672847095160512512

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: The countdown is on! Only one week left until the RADA IEO launch. RADA is thrilled to start this journey with you!Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1677316817335746563

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Thrilled to announce our partnership with the football legend himself, @guaje7villa. Welcome to the RADA family, David! Together we'll reshape the football world.‚öΩÔ∏èüöÄSource: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1677704871284445185

comments.body: Get ready to be amazed! Watch this captivating video that unveils the future of football. RADA Foundation is revolutionizing the game with cutting-edge technology. comments.body: RADA Foundation is on a mission to transform the world of football. With their visionary approach and cutting-edge technology, they are empowering clubs, players, and fans to reach new heights.Source: https://twitter.com/crypto_rada/status/1680215736231362561
